column3: Still experiencing "Error connecting to MMS provider" on Galaxy S5 after manual MMS setting
column4: http://hastebin.com/hibejavaxu

column3: Crash when reading MMS from notification bar
column4: http://hastebin.com/bilesucove  Got a group message from several people (mix of text secure, iphone, and other android users).   If I use the drop down notifications to click on the message, the app crashes and I have to enter my password again. If I open up the conversation list, and click on the unread message, everything works fine.   ATT galaxy s4 android 4.4.2

column3: use new NetworkRequest API to request an MMS network
column4: http://developer.android.com/reference/android/net/NetworkRequest.Builder.html

column3: Closing App - Strange Home Screen Behavior
column4: HTC One M8 with CM 11 running on 4.4.4 rooted  I notice when I go to close the app within recently opened apps once I close TextSecure, it kicks me out of recent apps and goes back to home screen and freezes for a second.  I also noticed volume buttons dont work sometimes which is strange, I cant figure out how to reproduce.

column3: Remove the TextSecure verification code (different than  #777 message)
column4: How to remove the verification code sms? The sms message sending initially the registered code stay on top. I did deleted it; it's not on the list anymore but still appear on my lock screen, instead of the new messages that I get. How to remove that? (OnePlus Android 4.4.4)

column3: sms just free for textsecure user?
column4: How do you bill sms send and received from a user who don't uses text secure?  My provider, Congster in Germany, has billed all sms send via text secure. I'm very surprised. Is this correct that these sms need to be payed?  If yes this tool maybe secure but useless as the invidence in Germany is very very low.  Looking forward for your answer.  Best wishes, Ediz

column3: Deregister a user from the WhisperSystems push server
column4: How do I do the equivalent of #755, but without a Android device, and using the WhisperSystems TextSecure server? A friend of mine went from Android to Windows Phone, but he didn't disable push, and the button to stop using encryption on my phone doesn't work.

column3: Enter key does not send
column4: Hitting enter simply makes a carriage return and does not send a text. This is despite the "Enter key sends" setting being checked.  I'm using version 14.0.9 on Android 5.0.1. Thanks.

column3: Can't send push messages, receiving is fine.
column4: Hi.  I cannot send any more push messages. That started short time after the update to v2.1.1 was installed.  The messages have the correct blue color, the time stamp and the locker symbol in the right corner, telling "sent successfully"  But they never arrive at the recipient's phone. I even tried 50 tiny messages, content = just the numbers [1..50].  From the same senders (just two) I can _RECEIVE_ textsecure push messages without any issues.  How to track down, what's going wrong here?  Push: activated SMS in: Disabled SMS send: none SMS reports: disabled Reporting in status bar: active LED colour: green LED flash: custom = 3003ms sound feedback: bubbles always inform (report, alert): on vibration: on activate ENTER: on ENTER sends: off design: dark language: german delete old messages: off password:  automatic key exchange: on protect screen: on MMS: disabled  Can I send an error report to me myself?  Next step would be to try LAN tracing, when pushing some messages to see, what's going on at IP level.  Regards, Rudi4

column3: Question: Gradlew "build successful", now what?
column4: Hi, This is my first Android APK build. Sorry if the mistake is too obvious, it isn't for me.  I followed the instructions found here (1 to 5): https://github.com/WhisperSystems/TextSecure/blob/master/BUILDING.md  The result was this:  signing.properties not found :help  Welcome to Gradle 1.11. To run a build, run gradlew  ... To see a list of available tasks, run gradlew tasks To see a list of command-line options, run gradlew --help BUILD SUCCESSFUL Total time: 5.701 secs  Now what? I did not get an APK.

column3: Allow export to "share..."
column4: Hi, the app "Nova Launcher" allows you to back up settings and send it to another app, like Dropbox immediately. It's a lot easier than having to hunt for the backup on the sd card. It would be cool if I could do the same for textsecure message exports.

column3: please add quick reply option.
column4: Hi, thank you for all your hard work it's truly appreciated!!  Please add a option for quick reply.  thanks.

column3: please add option to hear message tone while on a call
column4: hi, please add a option to hear message tone while on a call.  I can not get the vibrate to work and I'm blind so I can't see the notification in the status bar this would be useful.  Your app is extremely accessible to the blind and with Google's screen reader talk back.  I would be willing to donate if you add this option thank you.

column3: please add option for signature
column4: Hi, please add a option to have a signature to your message.  thanks.

column3: Contact number with space : sending error
column4: Hi, I've got a new problem with adding new conversation/contact.  When I add a new contact number, the contact apk put auto space every two numbers, if I want to open a new thread or receive a message of that contact, the number showed is with spaces. If I try to send a message to that number, it fail instantly. I'm pretty sure it's because of the spaces issue, I tried to start new thread, modify contact information, adding the number to open the thread : nothing worked. Thanks for reading.

column3: Editing contacts impossible
column4: Hi, I have a problem. Since I installed TextSecure, I can't edit my contacts any more. Let me explain. If I use the phone's default app to edit the name/surname of a contact (which I save on my sim card), and then reboot the phone, all the edits are gone. This started happening after I installed TextSecure, for some reason. It's obviously very annoying and it's kind of driving me crazy. Please fix it. Thank you

column3: Can't copy message text if link is occurrence
column4: Hi, I found a nice bug, when message is occurring the URL it can't be copied. Instead of this message it will be last, or previously one copied. Example: A: Hi, how are B: Fine, thx. Check this out http://google.com B: How is the weather? B: Bye!  So, I tried to copy first message with the link, it will be copied second, or third one, but not the link or message with it.

column3: How to maintain fingerprint when reinstalling?
column4: Hi, how can I maintain my fingerprint after a wipe and reinstall of my Android phone? It seems that I can import my messages, but TextSecure is giving me a new fingerprint. Is there some way to export/maintain it?

column3: Bad encrypted message...
column4: Hi, every now and then (perhaps once a month, but then again I don't text like crazy) I receive a "bad encrypted message" from a TS contact.  This one was received recently and I captured logs immediately. I don't have (and am unlikely to get) logs from the sender.  Logs: http://hastebin.com/zepunizevi  We have since exchanged 5-6 messages (some of them just a few minutes after the "bad message") with no issue - so I can't reproduce this... Hope the logs have some useful information. if not, it would be great to know what I should do next time this happens - other than (presumably) requesting the sender capture logs as well.

column3: please add option to hide message  sender and the contence of a message in notification bar.
column4: hi,  please add a option to hide the sender of a message and the message contence when the notification appears in the notification bar.  in other words it would now say new message from john smith and what he wrote.  what I want is just 1 new message that's it nothing about sender or what's in the message.  thank you for all you do.

column3: No notification sound
column4: Hi,  I have just upgraded to a Nexus 5 with CM11. I can receive text and MMS messages but there is no notification sound. The LED and vibrate works fine. I tried uninstalling and reinstalling text secure but that has not fixed the problem, when text secure was uninstalled I tried using the default messaging app and could not receive any test text messages. Does anyone know what the problem might be?  Thanks, Ben

column3: Subscription to whispersystems@lists.riseup.net does not work
column4: Hi,   I subscribed some months ago to whispersystems@lists.riseup.net with mlsATxlistDOTpw, got welcome message but did not receive any messages. I contacted listowner but never got a reply. Therefore trying it here. Can someone help me please.  Thanks mls

column3: Backup messages ?
column4: Hi, Is there a way to backup messages with  textSecure or is it backupable with any other backup app ? Thank you.

column3: Feature Request: Resend message via SMS when receiver is offline
column4: Hi, I'm living in a country where you do not have a permanent internet connection.  When you send a message to another TextSecure user while you are online, all further messages will be delivered via internet. If my internet connection drops, and my partner sends a message to me, I won't get it until I'm back online.  I would request a feature on the senders phone (online), which checks with the server if the push message was delivered after a certain amount of time (e.g. 5 minutes). If it was not received by the receiver, a notification in the NotificationBar should pop up, which asks the sender if he/she wants to resend the message via SMS.  I would love to implement this feature on my own, but before doing that I'd like to hear your comments!  Regards, sternze

column3: Tor implementation
column4: Hi, I'd like the option, to use text secure with orbot, to rise the anonmyisation.

column3: Adding a number or contact in a new thread
column4: Hi, I tried several time to send a message to a new contact or number with the plus sign. I added the contact and number, wrote the text and can't sent it, apps telling me that it's not a valid number, for every number I could write. I work with an Acer liquid Gallant Duo on Android 4.0.3 not rooted and the last version of textsecure available, any ideas? Thanks

column3: Share multiple photos (files)
column4: Hi, I love TextSecure but there's one thing that I find rather annoying. It often happens that I want to share some pics with someone (more than just one pic), and I have to select them one at a time instead of selecting them all and sending them all at once. It would be cool if I could pick them from the gallery and then click "share" and send them without going through the procedure n times. I don't think this should be hard to implement and it would save so much time and improve usability greatly. Thank you

column3: Irregular behavior in multitasking screen
column4: Hi, I installed TextSecure yesterday and came across an irregular behavior on the multitasking screen on my Nexus 4, running Android 4.2.2.  Steps to reproduce: 1. Open TextSecure plus two other random apps 2. Go to the mutitasking screen 3. Swipe one of the two random apps to the right. This is what happens: the app is removed from the list, the list stays open (expected behavior) 4. Now swipe TextSecure to the right (one other app still has to be in the list)  Result: TextSecure is removed from the list and the multitasking screen is closed immediately.  Expected behavior: Usually, the multitasking screen would remain open until the last app has been removed.  Furthermore, if I want to re-access the multitasking screen directly after it has been closed( by removing TextSecure from the list), it does not react - I have to wait around three seconds before the multitasking button starts reacting again.

column3: Export of conversations is not updating data when redone!
column4: Hi, I had to migrate my textsecure messages (export encrypted backup), but since I didn't have the time to migrate right after the backup I used textsecure for another week and did a new data export.  When I tried to import the backup afterwards I first had some issues getting it unencrypted (but it finally worked), but the main problem is:  **all messages between the first backup and the second backup are gone!**  I guess textsecure doesn't manage to overwrite previous backups when trying to make a new one! Please fix it even though my messages will probably remain lost...

column3: message drafts sometimes lost
column4: Hi, I experienced some frustration when starting a few messages, I had to check and copy some details to complete my messages. Coming back to my uncompleted messages, each time, no draft was memorized so I had to start all over ... Hope I am clear. Did I miss something or do others share the same issue ? Thank you.  Pierre Marie Paris, France

column3: (Usage, doc) Verification code
column4: Hi,   This is a question of usage, but you may turn it into a "documentation bug". I registered my cellphone # with TextSecure. I received a regular SMS from TextSecure (+1 412-212-8916) with a verification code. What do I do with it? I couldn't find on TextSecure a place to enter it. And I couldn't find a reference to verification code in the TextSecure documentation either.  Thank you Gustavo F.

column3: Error on transmission results in large message, crashing TextSecure.
column4: Hi,  the scenario: - B sends an image to A over encrypted channel. - There is an error on transmission - A cannot decrypt the message  - Textsecure interprets the message as plaintext (in the pane with all chats it is visible in preview as some base64-string) - On opening of the chat Textsecure tries to render the multi-kilobyte "text" message - Crash  This is critical as A can not chat with B any more. The only hotfix so far seems that B sends 10-20 messages to A, so the corrupted message is not visible on opening the conversation, but only after scrolling.  It is still impossible to scroll behind the corrupted message this way, so this is just a temporary hotfix.  Suggested fix: all text messages with more than X characters are rendered only partially and have to be clicked on to be shown completely. This will allow for the corruped message to be rendered partially and removed by hand.  (As a side effect this will allow for easier scrolling beyond long messages)

column3: Feature Request: Detect and warn about WhisperPush
column4: Hi,  TextSecure should detect if WhisperPush is enabled in the system (did not check how - I guess you can somehow read arbitrary system settings with the right permissions) and then warn the user to switch it off (and instead enable push messages in TS).  Here's why: It's actually possible to install TS on a system with WhisperPush as long as you don't turn on push messages. Obviously that makes little sense, but users might still do it, and it leads to a mess, as stated in #1925 .

column3: TS failes after upgrading OS
column4: Hi,  System: Cynogenmod Nightly (Android 4.4.4) TS: 2.0.8  I´m using Cynogenmod  therefore I´m updating the OS quite often. After every update I have to remove TS and install it again because TS can´t exchange encrypted messages anymore.   P.S. Needless to say this annoys my contacts when a new  key exchange message is displayed.  Thank you.

column3: TextSecure force-closes at startup after trying to send picture message.
column4: Hi,  My sister tried sending a picture message and apparently ever since the app force closes on opening. She wants a backup of her messages, and there's no way to get to any export function so we can reinstall the app to see if that fixes the problem. This is also the case for pulling logs-- have no way of getting to them.  What are some recommendations for what I should do next? I'm stumped. If we could simply get TextSecure to work again, that'd be great. I don't know when the next release is, or if it will even fix it, though.  Any input on what needs to be done next would be highly appreciated. Thanks!  This is version 2.3.3 on an LG Galaxy Showtime (LGL86C) using Straight Talk service (with MMS servers set up in settings) and stock 4.0 ICS.

column3: Contact shortcut/widget
column4: Hi,  it would be nice to be able to create shortcuts to contacts from my contact list. The new icon on the home screen would directy jump into the converstion with the selected user. The icon could be the users profile picture on the phone.

column3: Added message category to notifications for Android 5 silent mode.
column4: Hi,  I've noticed that textsecure notifications are not treated as messages in Android 5, meaning they won't show up if you configured "silent mode" (see settings -> sounds & notifications -> interruptions). From what I read from the docs, settings the category appropriately should do the trick. That said I currently don't have a build environment setup, but I'd appreciate some feedback on whether this is a good idea or not. If you like it I'll try to test this on my phone first.

column3: Compile without push/GCM?
column4: Hi,  I'd like to compile my own version of TS without any data options like GCM. Basically I want to go back to a pure SMS based app like it used to be. Can someone point me in the right direction as to where in the source I should look to remove this functionality? Or anyone know of any existing forks that already do this?  Thanks

column3: Password not accepted anymore
column4: Hi,  I type my password about 10 times a day because I enabled password timeout so I'm pretty sure I have it memorized.  However, TextSecure won't accept my password anymore. I didn't change it, the only thing I did was lock my bootloader on a rooted stock image.

column3: SMS from non-numeric sender showing push availability
column4: Hi,  i received a SMS from a anonymous/non-numeric sender (like "sender") and TextSecure is showing me the blue send button for secure messaging in the conversation. The two options on long press are push and insecure sms.  How can a non-numeric sender id be registered with the push service? Or is it a bug?

column3: Contact is not resolved once added
column4: Hi,  I receive an sms from an unknown contact. I clicked on the icon to add this number to a new contact. Once the new contact create textsecure stills display the phone number instead of the contact name. I quit and reopened the app and it still displays the number  logs are at http://hastebin.com/ponohivuhe

column3: [Request] Display the last unread messages in the conversation and jump there for easier reading
column4: Hi,  I receive a lot of messages in our group conversation and there is the litte problem. After picking up my phone after some time, I have to scroll up all the latest messages to search where the first latest message were received. Wouldn't it be easier if it jumps directly to first latest message, when I click on the conversation. And mark them as unread. Like Whatsapp or Threema do with their "unread messages" bar in the conversation. I wish i could show you an screenshot of this bar, but I deleted my accounts and deinstalled both.  regards,  KayuHD  PS: Sorry for my bad englisch. I'm from germany :)

column3: Wrong key for contact and can't end secure session
column4: Hi,  I have the stock Android 4.4 on a Motorola Moto G and my friend has Cyanogen Mod with TS as standard SMS app. We used it before on another phone, so now he has a different key. Mine however stayed the same.  I can't tell my TS to switch his key. He also doesn't receive my messages (they're probably encrypted with the wrong key? Our numbers stayed the same). I do receive his though. I also receive messages with a key symbol and TS tells me that this might mean that someone's trying to intercept messages (I don't remember the exact message). Anyway, so I tried to end the secure session and it said session cancelled but I guess it didn't really cancel it because the "cancel secure session" didn't disappear.  My friend send me his new key via QR-code by email and when I wanted to verify it, I got the message, that this is not the same key. Well, I knew that ...;)  Is there a way to delete his key on my phone and start a new encrypted converation? Does it have something to do with me using the App from Google Play and him using the integrated CM app? Why can't I cancel the secure session? Shouldn't that always be possible?  thanks!

column3: Missing group messages when user is offline
column4: Hi,  I have a group chat with two friends of mine. In the last days I noticed that I do not receive messages in this group chat while my device has no internet connection (for example because it's rebooting or I'm in a building where I have no signal). I would expect that these messages are delivered to me as soon as my device has an internet connection again.  Android version: Cyanogen Mod 11 (Android 4.4) TextSecure version: 2.2.0  Kind regards, Josef

column3: TextSecure crashes when trying to show message
column4: Hi,  I got a message (via push, i.e. by a sender using TextSecure with encryption), that makes TextSecure take a long time to open or scroll over the senders entry in my message list (about 20seconds on my Moto G running CyanogenMod). If I try to open the conversation with said sender, it takes even longer and (more than two minutes). Often it just crashes while trying to preview. Once I managed to actually see the message. It looked like lots of encrypted data that TextSecure did not decode but showed it as text. I could not copy the message, as TextSecure crashed some seconds later (see log [1])  Sometimes TextSecure even crashes when trying to preview the senders message in the general (see log [2]).  When save my messages via plaintext export, the problematic message does not show up. Thus I don't know how to pass it to you. Do you have any advice?  By the way, as TextSecure crashes when showing the message, I have no idea how to delete the message to make TextSecure work again. Do you have any ideas?  My device data: -  Motorola Moto G -  Cyanogenmod 11-20140504-SNAPSHOT-M6-falcon -  Android 4.4.2  If you need any other information, I will be happy to provide it.  [1] http://hastebin.com/uyinasoduh [2] http://hastebin.com/ibamiboqij

column3: finger print key - where is it stored?
column4: Hi,  I can check the finger prints from an identity using the lock symbol at the top from each contact.  But where are the compared key's stored?  I can not see if someones finger print is already checked or if the key changed.  A man-in-the-middle attack could be in progress...

column3: Blacklist incoming SMS
column4: Hi,  Any way or project for a blacklist. I have a friend I don't want to receive anymore of her so many sms.  I have read a similar subject 6 month ago but with no progress on this issue since  Thank you.  PM from France

column3: Textsecure 2.3.0 not visible in Playstore for Galaxy S2 with CM11
column4: Hi,  although 2.3.0 has been uploaded to Playstore a couple of days ago it is still not visible with my Galaxy S2 with CM11. I can only see 2.2.0. Am I missing something?  Regards,  mls

column3: Textsecure at 50 % CPU and cannot send or receive any encrypted messages
column4: Hi,  after having much fun with TextSecure for a long time it stopped working today. The visual issues are:  1.) when I send a PUSH/secure SMS message it stays in status pending. Insecure messages can be sent and received. 2.) when I restart my phone before entering the TextSecure passwd I see a notification of TextSecure "4 new messages". After login to TextSecure test messages from other users are not shown 3.) In Android System Info Pro I see that the TextSecure process runs at 50 %. The battery is drained by TextSecure and the phone heats up significantly. 4.) TextSecure UI is very slow. All new encrypted messages Push or secure sms only show "Decrypting, please wait..." but that are never displayed in clear text.   Any hint how what I can do to make it working again?

column3: Bad encrypted message...
column4: Hi,  A friend and I are using TextSecure 2.0.8. I'm running Android 4.4.2 and he's running 4.3.  We've exchanged dozen of encrypted messages in the past and everything worked fine.   A few days ago, I sent him a message with an image and he replied. It worked as expected. Then I replied with a text message. It was sent as a regular SMS, the bubble color was green. (I was in a place with very bad 3G signal).  Instead of receiving the message I sent him, he received a key icon, then a couple of hours later, what looks like encrypted text :  ![error-1](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/3520/2914697/7119f074-d69f-11e3-8e2b-c89601ed1bea.png)  He then sent me a message that appeared to be sent correctly from his side (blue bubble, nothing special), but appeared as "Bad encrypted message..." from my side.  I replied him, the message appeared to have been sent correctly from my side (blue bubble, nothing special), but he received a "Bad encrypted message..." too.  From this moment, all the messages we exchange are received as "Bad encrypted message...".  Here are his logs and mine :  https://gist.github.com/tbalthazar/7afe026443ee266cb4fb  Please let me know if you need more info.  Cheers, Thomas.

column3: media (image) display problem
column4: Hi!  Previous (received) images are shown, while sending a new one. Seems its stored somewhere and shown instead of the new one I sent in reply.  A force-close and re-opening textsecure shows the correct one again tho.  regards, nitrox

column3: CONTINUED error connecting to MMS  provider
column4: Hi!  I am a huge supporter of what Textsecure stands for and would like to continue using it. I am having a lot of trouble with MMS (error connecting to MMS  provider...). I have an LG Optimus with AT&T. I've tried both the mobile.att.net proxy as well add the Cingular.com option. Both worked for me at one point, but now neither one works. Can you help provide a solution for this problem so that I may continue to enjoy this wonderful app!  Thank you,  Mariana

column3: TS closes swipe screen / task manager when closed
column4: Hi TS Team,  Love your app!  1 bug that's annoying. When I press the bottom right window icon on my Nexus 4 (the button that shows all currently running tasks), and I swipe away TS, it closes the task manager.   Not urgent for functionality, but annoying because it's disruptive when I'm cycling through apps.  Thanks in advance...again, great app guys!

column3: TouchWiz notifications
column4: Hi there. Just started using this great app. It's replaced my main Texting app on my S3. If I receive a text message I do get a notification in the bar but I'm used to the notification showing on the icon that is locked at the bottom of the screen and also it shows a new message next to the shortcut icon on the lock screen. It would have a little 1,2,3 or 4 next to the icon if I'd received 1,2,3 or 4 messages. This has been a common feature for all messaging apps I've ever had. I don't hardly ever check the notification bar so I've already missed several messages today due to this and it's only my first day using the app.

column3: Menu Button "..." Missing
column4: Hi Guys,  first of all, you've done an awesome job!  I've just one issue over here: Neither in the main app-view, nor in the conversation-views, the "..." menu button shows up. I tried restarting the app and the phone ;)  Btw: I didn't know that this button should be in the corner on the top right, until a colleague showed me that I could have been able to attach pictures from within the app, if the button would have been there ;)  Phone details: HTC One S Android-Version 4.1.2  Please let me know, if you need additional info (Screenshot, ...)

column3: HTC one m8 (Verizion Wireless) not getting unencrypted mms msgs
column4: Hi everyone,  I am getting the infamous "Can't connect to MMS server" error. Pictures were received  from Iphones and an Android Samsung S5 phone. Strangely enough, it only worked once for the S5 (Received picture from the S5), then any future messages have errors. (Only had been 30 seconds between messages.)  I also tried manually setting the MMSC url to  http://mms.vtext.com/servlets/mms... Does not work.  Here's my log. http://hastebin.com/tibuxokite

column3: Type SMS without selecting recipient first
column4: Hi all,  When creating a new SMS message, a user is forced to select a recipient before being able to type a message. It's not uncommon for users to prefer to type the message first, than select the recipient(s). Advantage: if the user presses 'send' accidentally, an incorrect/incomplete message is not sent by accident.  One way some SMS apps implement this, is to have a recipient selection screen show up, like TextSecure does, but which also contains a button "Skip" or "Next". Pressing this button brings the user to the next screen, where the message can be typed. The top bar of the screen than doesn't display the recipient, but instead shows something like "Add recipient" or another visual cue of where to press to select a recipient.  Thanks for considering this, Ludovic  Nexus 5, stock Android 4.4.4, TextSecure 2.0.8.

column3: MMS doesn't support user/pass credentials
column4: Hi all,  I'm having trouble sending MMS messages from TextSecure. I'm on EE in the UK using a Samsung Galaxy S5 (rooted, latest firmware).  Attempting to send an MMS get me an "Error sending message" note under the message.  The error messages in the log make me suspicious. I suspect that my provider requiring authentication on the APN is causing trouble? ## Resources  Network help page on APNs: http://ee.co.uk/help/mobile-and-home-connections/checking-and-improving-your-network-coverage/our-network/changing-your-apn-settings  My SIM has these set as the values listed under Samsung S4/ S4 Mini:  ![2014-09-14 01 41 43](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/98908/4262657/8c8051e8-3bb0-11e4-8066-c1797c05d47b.png) ![2014-09-14 01 41 55](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/98908/4262658/8f7a0fce-3bb0-11e4-92e7-4d317b98fc62.png)  But also an 'eezone' APN. column3: Please make goup messages easy to compose #1776
column4: Hi Ooops, I was late to answer sorry! The topic was closed 4 hours ago by mcginty. I do not mean to reopen it; these are suggestions.  Indeed the above "issue" is to do with the user experience - not user-friendly enough in my humble opinion; "New group" is indeed confusing, "New group discussion / (Start) Group discussion" would be clearer (I don't know whether you are counting the words...) Why do we have to resort to the top right menu / couldn't we have contextual options (such as Start group discussion & Forward, ...) on long press (sorry not sure what's behind this in terms of graphical interface / dev. well, thanks for hearing me out Mcginty. ben

column4: Hi Issues: 1) When on wifi mms does not work

column3: Ts doesn't receive messages
column4: Hi A friend of mine doesn't receive push messages unless she has ts open in front of her. However she has better stuff to do than staring at the phone to get the messages...

column3: TextSecure doesn't want to use push, although the other user is registered
column4: Heyho!  I can successfully send and recieve push messages to resp. from other users but one: This very user registered her phone to the push service (is green in my contact list), but TextSecure seems to ignore this fact and insists on sending messages via SMS. The UI looks as if the receiving user doesn't have TextSecure installed, i.e. there is no lock symbol etc.   I used to send SMS messages to this user via TextSecure, before this user installed it on her phone. Is there a way to convince TextSecure to use push? Deleting the existing conversation didn't help.  http://hastebin.com/musugexido  (I didn't find the phone number in the log, sending SMS works, however I disabled it for testing purpose)

column3: No push notification with Nexus 5 on mobile data network
column4: Hey,  Since the first textsecure version I can`t receive push notification when I only get internet by mobile network. Only with wlan I receive messages. But when I send messages to my friends while mobile data is activated they receive my message. Background data is active. I'm using a Nexus 5 (stock rom) with the german eplus mobilenetwork. Another nexus user (nexus 4) in my friendlist has the same issue. The errorlog of textsecure: http://hastebin.com/duboqohase  I tried the app "push notification tester". Wlan has passed the test.  Mobile data creates this error in the debug log: "--------- beginning of /dev/log/main D/Push Notification Tester(19259): Step 1: Subscribe start W/ContextImpl(19259): Implicit intents with startService are not safe: Intent { act=com.google.android.c2dm.intent.REGISTER (has extras) } android.content.ContextWrapper.startService:494 com.firstrowria.pushnotificationtester.activities.MainActivity$2.onClick:136 android.view.View.performClick:4438  D/Push Notification Tester(19259): Step 1: registering to push updates failed, error code: SERVICE_NOT_AVAILABLE, registrationId: null, unregistered: null"  I hope someone can help me.

column3: I get no Push notifications with mobile data
column4: Hey,  Since the first textsecure version I can`t receive push notification when I only get internet by mobile network. Only with wlan I receive messages. But when I send messages to my friends while mobile data is activated they receive my message. I'm using a Nexus 5 with the german eplus network. Another nexus user (nexus 4) in my friendlist has the same issue.  I tried the app "push notification tester". Wlan has passed the test.  Mobile data creates this error in the debug log: "--------- beginning of /dev/log/main D/Push Notification Tester(19259): Step 1: Subscribe start W/ContextImpl(19259): Implicit intents with startService are not safe: Intent { act=com.google.android.c2dm.intent.REGISTER (has extras) } android.content.ContextWrapper.startService:494 com.firstrowria.pushnotificationtester.activities.MainActivity$2.onClick:136 android.view.View.performClick:4438  D/Push Notification Tester(19259): Step 1: registering to push updates failed, error code: SERVICE_NOT_AVAILABLE, registrationId: null, unregistered: null"  I hope someone can help me.

column3: Confusing session setup
column4: Hey,  Just a comment regarding the session setup. I sent a key exchange request after TS detected the sending party was using TS. Nice.  However, even though I have "Complete Key Exchanges" ticked, the received key was not processed (and since I got about 10-12 messages in one burst, the topmost (the remote key material), was out of sight, while all the others were still encrypted, with the "encrypted with an existing session" (or something like that :-) message).  Of course, as soon as I scrolled up and found the key exchange response message ("key" icon) and clicked on it, everything was fine. I do believe this will be confusing to new users, though.  Just two cents, keep up the good work!  /TB

column3: Problems with delivery of messages, receipts
column4: Hey,  I've some screenshots for invalid message or receipt handling:  (1) Message is delivered before sent (Message was delivered successfully)  ![1](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6777199/5495353/2ce992a6-86fd-11e4-8e89-2f1e377d77f7.png)  ![2](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6777199/5495355/32af45be-86fd-11e4-92ac-0abe7183e795.png)  (2) Messages are sent, but never delivered (12:35 messages are still not delivered...)   ![3](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6777199/5495377/635c5026-86fd-11e4-8720-15fbf6f0da87.png)  (3) Messages are delivered, but receipt is missing  My Phone (Message 11:08 pm has no receipt...)  ![4](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6777199/5495415/c94116ec-86fd-11e4-98b7-05ff5da5ca1f.png)  Receivers Phone (... but the message is delivered)  ![5](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6777199/5495423/df2d649c-86fd-11e4-9a8a-b372a0708c2f.png)  We both have the same phone (Android 5.0 vs 4.4), both latest Text Secure Version. The internet connection here is sometimes a bit bad, maybe the internal routine for network problems is a bit buggy?  Let me know if I can help with futher information.  Best regards

column3: Lost all my conversations (again), how come?
column4: Hey,  I just reached for my blinking mobile (Nexus One, MIUI 2.3.23, Android 2.3.7) to read a TextSecure message. TS has been restarted (it asked for my passphrase) and after entering that, I see TS has lost all my messages but the newly received one (which is from a group now called _Unnamed group_).  Unlike last time, I did not restart my phone, and instead tried to get some logging data out. I have no USB cable with me unfortunately. On a terminal (on device) as root I tried `logcat | grep -E "TextSecure|whispersystems"`, but all I got was  > W/PartProvider( 2725): Got master secret:  org.whispersystems.textsecure.crypto.MasterSecret@406b92a0  (... or so... beware, I typewrote that)  So I guess the ringbuffer is already emptied, meh.  Do you know of any way of getting my messages and pictures back? Can I supply you with more information so we can get to the cause of this?  Losing the TS database happened to me once before; Last time, I put the blame on the failing battery and subsequent file system recovery. This time, it just happened like that. Of course I tell all my friends to keep backups, of course I have none. So maybe it's just Karma. Meh.

column3: Tor and Textsecure
column4: Hey,  are there any risks using textsecure with the TOR-Network?  Best regards!

column3: TextSecure Crashes when run
column4: Hey guys. Please help me make heads or tails of this crashing problem. I Built TS from the sources and it gives me a Ts apk. When run on my Alcatel 918D (Dual Sim) It Tells you to create a passphrase you do that and press next it crashes. Start it again import your database.... 12 of 12 .. Updating.... Crashes again.. Doesnt go beyond this point. The logcat is here >>>>> http://pastebin.com/RnSX4Gi2

column3: Device incompatible - Android 4.4.2
column4: Hey guys,  I've just upgraded my Cyanogenmod Version to 4.4.2 and now it's unfortunately incompatible though it is the most current OS. Is there any way to get this working on that plattform or do I have to wait for the next play store update cycle? When will this about happen?  thanks for your great work;) greet'z 0x23marco

column3: SMS not sent - Smartphone to Normal Mobile
column4: Hey guys,  I've been trying several times to send an Sms from TextSecure to a mobile phone without TextSecure and Internet. Status is always "sent", but the Sms' never arrive.

column3: Feature Request:  300kB limit explanation for video attachments
column4: Hey great app, but when the error that says size restriction when you attach a video, can you guys make that say 300kB, because this seems to be the limit.  Thanks, took me a long time to figure out, could save others time.  I decreased my videos quality and it worked like a charm under 300kB

column3: Duplicate strings on Transifex
column4: Hey @moxie0 , I noticed as some other people on Transifex that a lot of strings are duplicates. Are they useful ? If not maybe we should take some time to clean up the strings to translate.

column3: Mms fixes
column4: Here's some mms bugfixes - ~~Always respect the user overridden mms settings~~ - For operators with multiple APNs, make sure we try all of them - ~~Reconnect if the mms radio connectivity timeouts~~ - Respect the proxyIfPossible flag

column3: Yet another group chat problem
column4: Hello, in the past few days every time I try to send a message to a group chat I am told the message failed the sending (which isn't true). Hence everyone is sending their messages twice, which as you can imagine is rather annoying.

column3: TextSecure Server
column4: Hello, I wonder if you have any documentation of how to assemble a "TextSecure" server for those who have basic knowledge.  I've been looking at some documentation but found it very basic for those who do not have much experience and now be starting with that.  I really enjoyed the privacy it offers us, I would mount a server here in my financial company, would assure some conversed data ...  I also wonder what operating system (ubuntu) I can use, how to run the server and align with the application ...  if you can help me somehow I thank you!  Google Translate (im from brazil).

column3: Group chat optimization
column4: Hello, I read on your blog post (https://whispersystems.org/blog/private-groups/) about some optimizations that could be done to group chats. Unfortunately I happen to spend a lot of time in places where the internet connection isn't so good, and this is often a problem. For example: 1. I send a message to the 5 other members of the group; 2. While the application is sending the message to the 3rd recipient, the 1st already has the message and answers back; 3. Since the internet connection of the 1st is better than mine, the 4th and 5th recipients often get the 1st's message before mine -- that is, they see the message with the answer before the message with the question. Is anything being done to improve the speed of messages sent in group chats? It's not only slightly annoying, it's also causing many problems because it's not so easy to understand "who is answering which message" when messages come in the wrong order. Thank you

column3: Bad encrypted message
column4: Hello, I have to report a weird bug. The other day I sent a message to a group chat. "N" receives the message just fine, and answers back. "A" responds to me in a private conversation (all this is happening via push), probably saying they couldn't read my message (?), but their message appears as "bad encrypted message". Annoyed by  this problem that has always plagued me since the very day I installed TextSecure (it keeps happening every once in a while), I end the secure session with A, unregister from the push service and register again. Now A can read my messages and I can read theirs. Yesterday I posted another message to the same group. A could read it and respond, while N couldn't. However, when N writes me in a private chat between us alone, everything works fine (we read each other's messages). This "Bad encrypted message" has been affecting me -- and my friends -- ever since we installed the application. Is there a reason why it happens? Please find a fix, I feel embarrassed for recommending my friends this application and causing them all these troubles.

column3: TS doesn't send messages on slow connection
column4: Hello, I have a problem. My internet provider slows my phone's connection after I reach 1GB of data. It slows it so I can't go faster than 30KB/s, but that's better than nothing. The problem is that although I am able to use other messaging applications (internet is slow, but still works), TextSecure doesn't send messages. At all. I do receive them, but I can't send them. They never go from the dull blue to the bright blue. And what's even worse is that even if after I connect the phone to a WiFi, it won't send those messages. Any ideas? I know I could send SMSs, but I'm looking for a solution and not a workaround. Thank you

column3: TextSecure doesn’t see the external SD card
column4: Hello, I am unable to attach photos and other files from my external SD card to messages. When I select “Add attachment” in a message thread, the file browser only shows the entries “Recent”, “Downloads”, and “Internal Storage”, lacking the SD card (as well as, say, the _Gallery_ app, but that’s of no importance to me) regardless of whether I want to send a picture, video, or sound (see picture).  The SD card is a 64 GB, Samsung-made card of the “EVO” series. Sending files from my old, 8 GB SD card worked and works just fine. However, all the other apps I’ve tried accessing the new card with (_Gallery_, _Total Commander_, _PPSSPP_, …) see, read from, and write to it without a problem. It might be an issue with the file picker, but I couldn’t find another app that uses the same one as _TextSecure_.  My device is a European Samsung Galaxy Note 3. I’m running Android 4.4.2 which I have rooted, but I’ve found nothing pertaining to this in _XPrivacy’s_ settings.  ![screenshot_2014-12-20-01-26-47](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/10248697/5513078/9cc694d0-87e7-11e4-8a54-9afebcc08ccf.png)

column3: Request - UI : Sliding pannel & option.
column4: Hello,  I believe that  there is a non-sense in the UI with a sliding panel on the left and a "regular" menu. In my sense they should be only one, 2 way to access the "option" is confusing. One thing could be that the sliding menu and the option button could trigger the slide.  Regards,

column3: Push messages late and UI and Media Requests
column4: Hello,   It's the second time i post something here so i don't really how the thing goes but i got several thing i would like to adress regarding the app. If i need to open several thread i will :)  1) Usually i don't experience problem with push message but at the moment one of my contact is in China ( i'm in europe) and it appear quite often that messages are delayed (in comparison to whatsapp). The second problem is that when the message is finally delivered - 5-15 minute later- the order is mixed up (eg: a message sent at 12:00 will be after one sent at 12:01). I believe it is more server sided and a connectivity problem but i wanted to address it even though i have no proposition to fix that.  2) There is a total non-sense in the UI with a sliding panel on the left and the option menu. In my sense they should be only one; lets say the sliding menu as it's trendy at the moment hence the option button could trigger the slide.  3) I could be nice to have the media button directly in the conversation ( e.g: next to the lock) and not in the menu.  4) Regarding media again i have only access to the gallery not the camera ( but might be my cellphone the problem ). Hence it could be more comfortable to share "stuff" if there was a camera option next to the gallery one.  5)Still regarding the media;  I saw it has been already noticed but as it hasn't changed since.... :  pictures compressions are too heavy. I understand that bandwidth is expensive but the picture are not "readable" like that.  I think that's all and hope i wasn't too negative as i really enjoy the app :)   regards,

column3: After upgrade to 2.3.2 can't send SMS
column4: Hello, What I noticed: After upgrade to 2.3.2 I can't send SMS. It is related to dual sim - when one of the sim cards has no signal - textsecure doesn't try to send an sms. It waits indefinitely also using a cpu (constant wakelock).

column3: Merge messages for same contact with multiple #s
column4: Hello, Sometimes there are multiple source numbers for the same service.. for example, Idea cellular company's advertisements, offers and profile updates come from different "from" address/phone number. However, all these sender numbers are listed in one contact in my phone's contact book.  It would be nice to have all these text messages shown under one entry on the Text Secure screen rather than 3 different persons with same name.

column3: TextSecure gets stuck and doesn't send messages
column4: Hello, sometimes it happens to me that TS doesn't send messages. The bubble of the message never turns "dark blue", you know? I am correctly connected to the internet and all the other apps work fine. What's worse is that the stuck message seems to prevent future messages from being sent, too. I have to reboot (just deleting the message not being sent doesn't work), and it's very annoying as many times I don't even realize until hours later -- because I rely on the "background sending"... bad idea. Unfortunately I don't have a debug log (I will post one when it happens again), but I was wondering if this is a known bug...? Thank you

column3: Cannot send unencrypted message
column4: Hello, I'm trying to send unencrypted message to my friend that uses Text Secure. We're currenty over secure session. I've long pressed send button and selected "Send unencrypted" but my message is still encrypted. How can I send unencrypted messages to my contacts in Text Secure?

column3: Add support to display contact of SMS received by an email address.
column4: Hello, I'm receiving SMSs from email addresses and the app is not recognizing them as a contact in my contact list. Just shows the address instead of the name and picture. Please add this feature. Thank you!

column3: unicode text not handled properly when using attachment
column4: Hello,  Just installed TextSecure in order to replace Viber, at least when communicating with certain people, but noticed some strange behaviour. If I send message along with some attachement (e.g. picture) and using Croatian native characters - čČ ćĆ đĐ šŠ žŽ - they are all displayed as ????? on the receiving end.  However, if I send plain message (without any attachment) with the same native characters, everything is fine on the receiver end.  Any hint?  Sincerely, Gour

column3: Send SMS to multiple recipients without creating a group
column4: Hello,  I have not found a way to send a SMS to multiple recipients without creating a group. That could be useful for some reasons. In my case, I don't send messages to one well defined group all the time, it is very usual that I send a message to a group +/- 2 or 3 recipients. And it is often for only one or two messages. Those are the reasons why I think that having a way to send SMS to multiple recipients without creating a group could be useful.   Thanks Thorleif,  PS: I apologize if anyone suggests it yet but I haven't found with keyword and I have not enough time to scroll every issues.

column3: Import encrypted backup does not accept correct password
column4: Hello,  I got my whole family to use TextSecure but sometime after the last update a few issues turned up. One family member kept getting removed from our group ("X has left the group") and re-adding her did not help. We also could not send her any messages ("Error sending message").  I decided to reinstall TextSecure on her phone (SGS4), after creating an encrypted backup.  However, using the import feature, the old password was rejected and we couldn't get past the password prompt.  Creating a new account with the old password and THEN importing the backup worked, for some reason, but all messages were unreadable. Randomly sending messages to other family members, she was able to re-exchange keys (despite importing the backup, she now had a new key/ID) with some people, but not with me, for example. I still can't exchange messages with her and I don't see any option to exchange keys again.  So this is half bug report and half plea for help to get things working again...

column3: MMS sending (and receiving) fails if on WiFi and APN is set to IPv6
column4: Hello,  I am having trouble sending and receiving MMS on my T-Mobile USA Samsung galaxy S4 (Android 4.4.4) while connected to WiFi. I am using TextSecure 2.1.8.  It looks like the problems have something to do with the switch from IPv4 (on WiFi) to IPv6 on the cellular network.  If I manually disable WiFi and send a MMS through TextSecure on the IPv6 only APN, the MMS is correctly sent and received.  If I manually switch the APN to IPv4 only, then TextSecure correctly sends and receives MMS while connected to WiFi (by transitioning to the cellular network to send the MMS).  However, if I use the default APN of the phone (IPv6 only) and I am connected to the IPv4 only WiFi, sending fails. The logs show that TextSecure attempts to connect to the cellular, but then times out connecting to the MMSC (2607:7700:0:5::ab8:4b81) because of Network unreachable.

column3: Option to burn or clear message
column4: Hello,  I am a huge supporter of securtext, I simply have a suggestion to make. I think its important to be able to clear screen or burn certain messages after the other person has viewed them. If its a secure conversation it will inusure the sender that the reciever would not be able to show anyone at a later date.

column3: CAn I?
column4: Hello! Can i use the code for this app and change a lot and make it to my own? I will change all imgaes sound every thing!

column3: Send via secure SMS if no Internet connection
column4: Hello!  My problem is, if i send a message via Push it works great but if I have no Internet connection the message didn't get sent. In earlier version it worked. I don't use Xprivacy and TS has all rights. Now I solve it, that a hold the send button and switch to send via secure SMS, but I would prefer, when this happens automatically when I have no Internet connection.  TS version 2.3.2  Best regards rene

column3: Automatically ask for Passphrase after reboot
column4: Hello guys  Thanks for this great app! Very useful!  Ummm, it would be great if TextSecure asks for the passphrase asap after rebooting the phone. Sometimes I forgot to unlock it and do not receive any messages for hours which is not so good ...  Any ideas?

column3: TextSecure won't stop asking me to configure my MMS settings. HTC one m8
column4: Hello all,  Recently, I've switched to Viperone m8 3.2.1 rom on my HTC one m8 (Verizon). Everything seems to work fine including calls, 4g/3g, etc. However, it doesn't detect my sim card properly as it should. So this causes TextSecure to ask for my MMS settings even though it already had them entered.  The strange part is that I can send MMS txts just fine. But not receive them. See the pictures below. I even tried to add my APN, but there is no option to add it.  Debug log: https://gist.github.com/anonymous/aba2acd498cfc7b53ec4  ![device-2014-12-25-134003](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/3073252/5554894/97b9a9fa-8c3d-11e4-97c4-a098c8ce77a2.png) ![device-2014-12-25-134233](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/3073252/5554895/97b9ce3a-8c3d-11e4-8393-fd0a44e75df9.png) ![device-2014-12-25-134319](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/3073252/5554893/97b9c930-8c3d-11e4-8c67-490bf1e9808a.png) ![device-2014-12-25-134653](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/3073252/5554896/97bfe6ee-8c3d-11e4-8a7a-6b2977ac8448.png)

column3: Unable to switch to secured message
column4: Hello !  I installed textsecured on two phones. On the second one, the icon to send the message is blue, and the lock is closed, so I assume this means I can send secured sms to the first phone. But on the first phone, the icon is still green, and the lock still open. So I can just send classic SMS to the second phone. When I disable the ability to send classic SMS on this phone, I am unable to send SMS to the second one.  Is there a way to force the use of secured sms, or is it a bug ?  Thank you for your answer, and please excuse my flawed english.

column3: feature request deep sleep wake
column4: Hello   Can you please add a feature so that when using a deep sleep battery savers like DS battery saver. The encrypted message gets sent along with an unencrypted network wake up text. I don't receive texts until I turn the screen on myself   Thanks

column4: Hej there,  Today I accidentally killed my TextSecure app and after restarting and unlocking it a bunch (a lot of them, actually) of messages were missing. I think this should be all messages I received after unlocking it for the last time. Do they get written to the database only if the app is shut down correctly? Were are they in the meantime? Is this behaviour intentionally?  Cheers Felix

column3: Add Android Wear support
column4: Hangouts has the possibility to answer with predefined answers or voice. Something similar would be awesome for TextSecure. Since all this works over notifications, this should be reasonably easy to intergrate.

column3: Less emojis please
column4: Half the screen of my xperia active is wasted when editing a message choosing an emoji.

column3: More l10n - for decrypting errors
column4: Had this in abandoned #1325 already. (Getting close to 100% localization :)

column3: Search doesnt find groups
column4: Groups that are visible in the regular conversations view are not found when searching for their names. Its probably the same issue that has been pointed out here  http://support.whispersystems.org/customer/portal/questions/8473126-can-t-see-send-to-groups  I am quite sure that this was not the case back in July. If I recall correctly then it was also possible to find the groups in the contacts screen (the one that pops up when hitting +).  Device info: HTC Desire HD, Cyanogenmod 7.3, TextSecure 2.1.8

column3: Sending message in group chat fails
column4: Group chat with 3 other persons. Messages are received correctly, but TextSecure always gives an error sending message to the sender.   TextSecure version 2.2 on Android 4.4 Debug log: http://hastebin.com/okitotoheq

column3: fallback to imprecise scaling if low memory
column4: Gracefully falls back to rough scaling to solve the OutOfMemoryErrors that I was able to reproduce on a GB emulator with low RAM. This helps a lot since it doesn't require two large Bitmap objects in memory at the same time.  Also moved away from BufferedInputStream to another workaround to the Android bitmap problems, which will save more memory. On top of that, we weren't closing the streams so that's also fixed.

column3: Missing license headers
column4: GPL license requires all source files have a license header. I have added it to those those files that didn't have it  After that I have also updated Copyright notices: "2013 Open Whisper Systems" to "2013-2014 Open WhisperSystems"  Note the removed space. This is the correct name, right?  And changed Copyright from Moxie Marlinspike to Whisper Systems, for consistency with the rest of files. Please @moxie0 confirm that you are fine with it :)  One doubt is when does copyright from Whisper Systems end and Open WhisperSystems begin? Is updating "2011 Whisper Systems" to "2011-2012" fine? Or does 2012 belong to Open WhisperSystems?

column3: mms photo thumbnail blank
column4: got an mms from an iphone user, the preview is blank, upon clicking and extracting it, it displays in an external viewer just fine.  log: http://hastebin.com/icusokotoj

column3: Attached image not previewed, download failed
column4: Got an image only message. The download arrow shows up always. Even after phone restart. When tapping on the image the "do you want to open unsafe" question popus up. But the image viewer shows nothing.  The contact who sent me that image has the same issue opening an image I sent to him. He reinstalled lately on a new device. TS text message only works though.  Sending an image to another contact works too.  Here's the error log for the empty image:  ``` I/Timeline( 3984): Timeline: Activity_idle id: android.os.BinderProxy@43182df0 time:6025762 W/ImageSlide( 3984): Got soft reference: null W/ImageSlide( 3984): Got soft reference: null W/ConversationItem( 3984): Clicked: content://org.thoughtcrime.provider.securesms/part/113 , image/jpeg W/KeyCachingService( 3984): Decrementing activity count... W/PartProvider( 3984): openFile() called! W/PartProvider( 3984): Parting out a single row... W/PartDatabase( 3984): Getting part at ID: 113 W/PartProvider( 3984): java.io.FileNotFoundException: No part data for id: 113 W/PartProvider( 3984):  at org.thoughtcrime.securesms.database.PartDatabase.getPartStream(PartDatabase.java:288) W/PartProvider( 3984):  at org.thoughtcrime.securesms.providers.PartProvider.copyPartToTemporaryFile(PartProvider.java:71) W/PartProvider( 3984):  at org.thoughtcrime.securesms.providers.PartProvider.openFile(PartProvider.java:99) W/PartProvider( 3984):  at android.content.ContentProvider.openAssetFile(ContentProvider.java:1213) W/PartProvider( 3984):  at android.content.ContentProvider.openTypedAssetFile(ContentProvider.java:1393) W/PartProvider( 3984):  at android.content.ContentProvider.openTypedAssetFile(ContentProvider.java:1459) W/PartProvider( 3984):  at android.content.ContentProvider$Transport.openTypedAssetFile(ContentProvider.java:342) W/PartProvider( 3984):  at android.content.ContentProviderNative.onTransact(ContentProviderNative.java:312) W/PartProvider( 3984):  at android.os.Binder.execTransact(Binder.java:404) W/PartProvider( 3984):  at de.robv.android.xposed.XposedBridge.invokeOriginalMethodNative(Native Method) W/PartProvider( 3984):  at de.robv.android.xposed.XposedBridge.handleHookedMethod(XposedBridge.java:631) W/PartProvider( 3984):  at android.os.Binder.execTransact(Native Method) W/PartProvider( 3984):  at dalvik.system.NativeStart.run(Native Method) W/IInputConnectionWrapper( 3984): showStatusIcon on inactive InputConnection W/PhoneNumberFormatter( 3984): Got local CC: DE W/Session ( 3984): Checking session... ```  http://hastebin.com/uhugukilop

column3: allow url client to follow redirects before checking response code
column4: getInputStream is the method that follows redirects, so we need to call that first to get to the final URL before checking the status code.  evidence: http://grepcode.com/file/repository.grepcode.com/java/root/jdk/openjdk/7u40-b43/sun/net/www/protocol/http/HttpURLConnection.java/

column3: TextSecure intercepts encrypted SMS but not encrypted MMS
column4: Galaxy S4 i9505 Android 4.3 XXUENAA. TextSecure 2.0.8  Encrypted SMS are sent and received just fine with text secure option set to 'not handle all SMS'.  Encrypted MMS send fine but will not be intercepted by textsecure unless option to 'handle all MMS' is set to on. With option off encrypted MMS are coming through stock android messaging app. Also even with textsecure set to 'handle all MMS' set to on sometimes there will be no notification of having received a MMS at all.

column3: MMS NPE
column4: From the crash logs.  ``` java.lang.NullPointerException at java.net.InetAddress.getAddress(InetAddress.java:185) at org.thoughtcrime.securesms.mms.MmsConnection.checkRouteToHost(MmsConnection.java:86) at org.thoughtcrime.securesms.mms.IncomingMmsConnection.retrieve(IncomingMmsConnection.java:71) at org.thoughtcrime.securesms.jobs.MmsDownloadJob.retrieveAndStore(MmsDownloadJob.java:197) at org.thoughtcrime.securesms.jobs.MmsDownloadJob.onRun(MmsDownloadJob.java:116) at org.thoughtcrime.securesms.jobs.MasterSecretJob.onRun(MasterSecretJob.java:18) at org.whispersystems.jobqueue.JobConsumer.runJob(JobConsumer.java:72) at org.whispersystems.jobqueue.JobConsumer.run(JobConsumer.java:46) ```

column3: Refreshing the directory doesn't update displayed contact list
column4: From the contact chooser, hitting the refresh directory action in the actionbar doesn't update the currently displayed list.  You have to close the activity and re-open it.

column3: Use Google Play Services 6.5 for reduced APK size and compile time
column4: From an [article](http://www.androidpolice.com/2014/11/18/google-play-services-6-5-rolling-now-granular-sdk-dependencies-new-features-fit-maps-drive-wallet-apk-download/) on Android Police:  "Google's final announcement [about Google Play Services 6.5] may actually have the greatest impact of all. With the latest release, the GMS library will be broken up into individual parts for each major set of APIs. This will finally alleviate the stress of including the full library, which weighs in at almost exactly 1 MB after it's compiled into an app. For example, an app that only requires push messaging will be able to do so while only increasing its footprint by about 75KB. While most users with current, high-end devices probably don't notice the burden, this is great for older and budget-oriented hardware. This change will also go a long way towards reducing memory usage and download size. Oh yeah, and this should cut a minute or two off of compile times. Hallelujah!"

column3: Give option for user to suppress warning on opening attachments
column4: Friends who are using TextSecure have found it frustrating that it alerts them every time they want to view an image.  ![alert](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2271265/4263833/ff31b85a-3c03-11e4-9457-3b796d9826d4.png)  Even if they have the passphrase option disabled it still prompts them.  My "I'm totally an artist" mockup: ![yibfmub](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2271265/4263838/a3b182fc-3c04-11e4-8556-b9d9e2837d90.png)  But I'd recommend the box being **unchecked** by default and an option in settings to reenable the alert.

column3: Crash when sending PUSH message to new contact
column4: Friend of mine told me over email he also uses TextSecure. I added his int'l phone number as a contact on my phone and then attempted to send him a message via TextSecure.  1st message I tried sending: Shows up as green/SMS  - is not actually sent, gives me pop-under "Tap for insecure fallback". I did not take the offer. Logs: http://hastebin.com/newuhiwaha  2nd message I tried sending: Shows up as blue/PUSH - but is never actually sent (dark blue, no timestamp). TextSecure crashed immediately after I hit the "send" arrow.  Logs: http://hastebin.com/okinuwimeq  3rd message I tried sending: Exactly same behaviour as previous. Immediate crash. Logs: http://hastebin.com/usalowafus  At this point I tried the option "Refresh PUSH directory" but it didn't seem to help - next message I tried sending to this new contact was followed by an identical crash.  Now, two days later, I can communicate with this person just fine over PUSH, no crashes.  I hope the logs give you something to go on. Let me know if I can provide any further info.  Thanks a bunch for TS!

column3: message being repeatedly sent
column4: For reasons I have not had time to investigate (possibly overly restrictive firewall settings), receiving mms fails to work when connected to wifi  When this happens for a given contact, a message I am trying to send that contact gets "stuck" and TextSecure tries to resend it every time I unlock the lock screen.  Process is as follows: 1. I receive an mms from a contact while connected to wifi. 2. I am unable to dowload it, and TextSecure pops up an "unable to connect to mms" error. 3. I subsequently send any number of sms messages to contact. 4. One of them (the same one each time) will resend every time I unlock TextSecure.  Debug log: http://hastebin.com/jizujofaga  Cheers, Darrik Mazey

This also unifies AudioSlide's and VideoSlide's `constructPartFromUri` as they were edited anyway.  Fixes #1362 and #1914   I strongly recommend merging #2234 and #2232 as without them forwarding message is not funny...

column3: Error messages in Argentina
column4: For example I live in Buenos Aires and my friend too, so when I need to send a sms to my friend (In Buenos Aires), I have 4 numbers to send it:  11-245678 15-245678 11-15-245678 +54-11-245678  +54: Code for country 11: Code for Buenos Aires (Sometimes is posible using 011) 15: This is a prefix for mobile phones.  When I must register in Texsecure to use push message, I must add a number, the 9. So, if you want to call to me o want to send a message to me, you need add a 9. This is only for people outside Argentina.  Example:  +54-9-11245678 (+54 Argentina Code, get off the code 15, and put the code 11)  Possible problems for this: 1. If I want to register in Textsecure without 9, the message never arrive. Neither the call. Nobody knows in Argentina that is necessary this, so we have problems in this step. 2. If I want to send a push message to my friend, I need add her to my contacts with the number (+54911245678) like she would be in another country. 3. If I send her a push message with the number 11245678 or 15245678 don't work. (message incorrect cipher). The most people don't know when they need to put the numer 9 or the +54, so the message never will arrive between friends. 4. If I 'm online (with internet) and send to my friend a message and she has internet too the message arrive correct both. 5. If I'm offline (without internet) and send to my friend a message and she has internet, doesn't work. (message incorrect cipher). This error is really annoying because If somebody of us doesn't has internet, the message says incorrect cipher. In Argentina is very common that some places don't have 3g signal.  I hope this help you. Thanks for all.  Best regards.

column3: Menu item to send a TextSecure installation link
column4: For easier spread of TextSecure, it might be good to offer a menu item in unencrypted SMS conversations that starts the message editor with TextSecure's Google Play link (and maybe a text like "Please install the following for encrypted communication:").  The menu item should have a name like "Ask for encrypted communication", although this might be too long.

column3: Samsung Note 3 & Note 4: unclickable - notifications in pull down menu and new key exchange prompts in app
column4: For both the unmodified Samsung Note 3 (4.4.2 with build N900FUVUENK3) and Samsung Note 4 (4.4.4 with build N910FXXU1ANK4), when messages are received, the notifcation appears.  But when the pull down menu from the home screen (ie not in app) is used to view the notification, tapping the notification does nothing.  User is not taken into the app to view the message.  The "Mark as Read" in the notifcation area does work however.  Just not tapping the message.  On other phones doing so takes the user to the message in app.  Likewise, when in app, and user receives a message for the first time from any other TextSecure user, and the app prompts in app for the key exchange, while the message says to tap, tapping does nothing.  The app does not respond in any way to tapping the exchange request message.  This occurs even after waiting for a day or so.  The only way to resolve is for both parties to remove the app, re-install, and re-initialize.  This does not resolve the tapping issue.  That still exists, but the keys seem to auto-exchange on their own at that point.

column3: "Permanent TextSecure communication failure!" on Android 2.3.7
column4: For about the last two days, I've been getting the notification "Permanent TextSecure communication failure!" with the text "TextSecure was unable to register with Google Play Services. Com". After "Com" I'm was sure there were more letters but they are cut off. I don't know how newer Android versions work, but on 2.3.7 the notifications don't scroll so only by reading through code can I find the text that says "Communication over the data channel has been disabled, please try re-registering from the TextSecure settings menu."  Of course, the next problem I have is that I cannot find any "re-register" option in the settings menu. Again, reading code shows me that the RegistrationActivity intent is launched by enabling "Push messages", which is already enabled.  So, I do that. And now, finally, I get a warning message. Google Play Services needs to be updated to use this. So there's the issue. I'm actually guessing that I didn't need to re-register, I probably just needed to update Google Play Services. Can't say for sure though, as I've already de-registered.  Anyway, the original notification is thrown up by a failed call to GooglePlayServicesUtil.isGooglePlayServicesAvailable(context). Instead of just checking for "resullt != ConnectionResult.SUCCESS", TS could also check for the other possible return values and tell the user the actual reason behind the error.

column3: Add batch mode to contextual action bar
column4: Follow-up to #1008. CAB = Contextual Action Bar.  The implementation works only on API 11+, so I left the "old" CAB for API 9-10.  If only one item is selected, the new CAB works exactly as the old one did. As soon as a second item is tapped, all menu items but delete get removed/hidden and the title is set to "batch mode" with a subtitle telling how many items are currently selected. The delete action works exactly like the deletion of conversations in the ConversationListFragment, which means it uses an AsyncTask. In fact, I took the code for most of the multiple-delete method from there, so credits to whoever implemented this ;-)  When the selected items are reduced to one, the classic CAB is shown again.  ![cab](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1475672/3269273/46bf54e2-f2ea-11e3-83d8-0867ad5cd3c5.png)

column3: Intermittent Error Downloading Attachments
column4: First, the details: Samsung SGH-M919 (JGEDLTEUE) Cyanogenmod 11-20141112-SNAPSHOT-M12-JFLTE TextSecure Version 2.3.3  Log: https://gist.github.com/29fc12c3b52e4358f76c  Problem: Sometimes when I someone sends me a photo attachment, it will not download. I am presented with a message notification, and there is a message bubble in the thread with a download button in it. If I tap the button, the bubble changes to "Connecting to MMS Server" stays for a few seconds, then changes back to a download button. There is no way to retrieve it. I have tried tapping it over and over again, restarting the phone, force-closing the app. Nothing works.   The problem happens sporadically, and happens with both encrypted and unencrypted messages, sent from TS and other messengers, over push and SMS (MMS).

No Vibration, no Sound and no Icon in the status Bar.

column3: Changelog not shown in play store on device
column4: First I thought the 2.0.6 and 2.0.7 releases didn't have a changelog at all in the play store. But it turns out, that it's only visible on the browser version (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.thoughtcrime.securesms) but not in the play store app. Older releases did show the changelog on top of the description tough.  Android version: 4.4 TextSecure version: 2.0.6, 2.0.7 Expected behaviour: Changelog section before the general description in play store app. Actual behaviour: No changelog in app, only in webversion.  I can see the changelogs of every other app and there is at least one play store rating that complains about the same problem.

column3: Swiping away (closing) the app in the multi-tasking view exits the multi-tasking view
column4: Expected behavior: 1. Enter the "recents" multi-tasking view 2. Swipe the app away to close it 3. The multi-tasking view remains open  Actual behavior:  After swiping away the app in step 2 above, the multi-tasking view exits and the home screen is displayed.  Both myself and my wife have observed this issue.  I'm running version 2.0.7 on a CM11 nightly build on my Nexus 5.  She is running the same app version and vanilla KitKat 4.4 on her Nexus 4.

To view my recent apps again, I have to press the "recent apps button" twice instead of once.  This only happens when swiping away Text Secure, not with other apps.  I have version 2.1.4 installed, but the same thing happened with previous versions.  Nexus 5, Android 4.4

column3: NullPointerException in WhisperMessage constructor on 2.3.3 Play Store build
column4: Every time I enter my password, TextSecure eventually tries to decrypt a particular MMS and then fails with this stack trace:  ``` java.lang.NullPointerException        at org.whispersystems.libaxolotl.protocol.WhisperMessage.(WhisperMessage.java:50)        at org.thoughtcrime.securesms.crypto.MmsCipher.decrypt(MmsCipher.java:64)        at org.thoughtcrime.securesms.jobs.MmsDownloadJob.storeRetrievedMms(MmsDownloadJob.java:215)        at org.thoughtcrime.securesms.jobs.MmsDownloadJob.retrieveAndStore(MmsDownloadJob.java:199)        at org.thoughtcrime.securesms.jobs.MmsDownloadJob.onRun(MmsDownloadJob.java:116)        at org.thoughtcrime.securesms.jobs.MasterSecretJob.onRun(MasterSecretJob.java:18)        at org.whispersystems.jobqueue.JobConsumer.runJob(JobConsumer.java:72)        at org.whispersystems.jobqueue.JobConsumer.run(JobConsumer.java:46) ```  Ultimately it looks like some invalid Base64 got saved to the DB, which makes [this function](https://github.com/WhisperSystems/TextSecure/blob/master/src/org/thoughtcrime/securesms/util/Base64.java#L1138) return `null` through [this function](https://github.com/WhisperSystems/TextSecure/blob/master/src/org/thoughtcrime/securesms/mms/TextTransport.java#L27) to [here](https://github.com/WhisperSystems/TextSecure/blob/master/src/org/thoughtcrime/securesms/crypto/MmsCipher.java#L60), and then that gets passed to the `WhisperMessage` constructor which NPEs trying to get `serialized.length`.

column3: Group chat, member is missing messages and sends keys
column4: Didn't find anything like in the issues.  I opened a group with a 4 other receivers. - I sent a message - member A sent a message - member S did not receive member A's message (and was confused about the next messages the others wrote) - ONLY member A receive a key message from member S x - I wrote a few texts - member N sent a message - member S did not receive member A's message (and was even more confused about the next messages the others wrote) - ONLY member N received a key message from member S **(and was confused about the next message the others wrote)**  Couldn't get them to post logs... :( But to me it looks as if member S had not communicated with A and N after (some time ago) reinstalling TS. This really needs to be fixed/changed!  _This was one of my attempts to promote TS and - sadly - it failed. Even the tech nerd (not me) in the group found this very annoying._

column3: [Idea] DialSecure
column4: DialerSecure: control the dialer/restrict the whole address book and call history until it's unlocked.  1) Hide the address book/call history until unlocked  2)  _Optional_ Limit/Hide incoming calls when locked? 2b) Hide missed calls. (full, limited or no notification of missed calls when unlocked) 3) Turn off dialing completely until you unlock it or offering "guest" access to dial without viewing your address/call history. 4) Limit the "phone" part of the phone when giving the phone to your children.

column3: TextSecure plays alert twice
column4: Description: TextSecure plays the new message alert twice when the TextSecure app window is active and a new message comes in.  Steps to replicate: 1. Open TextSecure and unlock the database 2. Leave the application active 3. Receive an SMS message 4. Hear alert message played twice (with two plays overlapping)  Workaround: Close the TextSecure app or switch to an alternate active window before receiving another SMS.  Unknown variables: Does this apply to only SMS or SMS and MMS?
